51ee3f4f-623b-4387-ad34-37effae5df3a.name: Directional
51ee3f4f-623b-4387-ad34-37effae5df3a.notes: @Direction: Back, Right, Left, Top or Underside@

23ba6513-e630-41c3-874d-facc9264bd67.name: Tough Skin
23ba6513-e630-41c3-874d-facc9264bd67.notes: Effects that just require skin contact or a scratch ignore this DR

ee4c9f4f-4246-4446-8fd1-43f002b9ec52.name: Oxygen Storage
ee4c9f4f-4246-4446-8fd1-43f002b9ec52.notes: Can hold breath 25 times as long as normal

cd6400cb-044c-453e-9dbd-d2640a15afc1.name: Oxygen Storage
cd6400cb-044c-453e-9dbd-d2640a15afc1.notes: Can hold breath 50 times as long as normal

276a2502-7686-4a30-bf0d-ad6d48d49dc2.name: Oxygen Storage
276a2502-7686-4a30-bf0d-ad6d48d49dc2.notes: Can hold breath 100 times as long as normal

7d0e4e51-fbb4-4430-8c3d-9db64ef1ffc4.name: Oxygen Storage
7d0e4e51-fbb4-4430-8c3d-9db64ef1ffc4.notes: Can hold breath 200 times as long as normal

5ef6f258-d93d-43dc-9fd6-68ca9ecc6c03.name: Oxygen Storage
5ef6f258-d93d-43dc-9fd6-68ca9ecc6c03.notes: Can hold breath 300 times as long as normal

c64d077e-9c9b-4f04-8a61-fc7ce00fcd1b.name: Diffuse
c64d077e-9c9b-4f04-8a61-fc7ce00fcd1b.notes: Immune to crippling injuries. Brain, Vitals and Groin cannot be targeted. Most foes cannot slam or grapple you (GM's decision). Do not bleed. Unaffected by blood-borne toxins. Immune to attacks that rely on cutting off blood to part of your body. Impaling and piercing attacks of any size never do more than 1 HP of injury, regardless of penetrating damage. Other attacks never do more than 2 HP of injury. Exception: Area-effect, cone, and explosion attacks cause normal injury

2010af0b-c996-4122-82db-f546f63461a3.name: Homogenous
2010af0b-c996-4122-82db-f546f63461a3.notes: Altered wound modifiers: imp & pi++ are x1/2, pi+ is x1/3, pi is x1/5, pi- is x1/10

d11c35d0-5670-464a-80fa-4473e79f0837.name: No Blood
d11c35d0-5670-464a-80fa-4473e79f0837.notes: Do not bleed, unaffected by blood-borne toxins, immune to attacks that rely on cutting off blood to part of your body

1efb806a-a6eb-44b9-ad87-631897d23284.name: No Brain
1efb806a-a6eb-44b9-ad87-631897d23284.notes: Brain cannot be targeted. Blows to the skull or eye are treated like blows to the face, except that eye injury can still cripple the eye

4155a4a1-a9f0-4b15-84e0-3ab0f5d0ce35.name: No Eyes
4155a4a1-a9f0-4b15-84e0-3ab0f5d0ce35.notes: Eyes may not be targeted. Immune to blinding attacks

6ca97e45-dedf-4282-887a-603261021ffb.name: No Head
6ca97e45-dedf-4282-887a-603261021ffb.notes: Skull, Brain and Face cannot be targeted

e52775ba-4dba-4fb4-abd8-5a91e6e25ce5.name: No Neck
e52775ba-4dba-4fb4-abd8-5a91e6e25ce5.notes: Neck may not be targeted and cannot be decapitated, choked or strangled

905e007f-effb-4795-8eb5-ad4adaa3aba5.name: No Vitals
905e007f-effb-4795-8eb5-ad4adaa3aba5.notes: Attacks to the Vitals or Groin are treated as attacks to the Torso

2455d57c-eca1-4101-93d6-13226d91b0da.name: Unliving
2455d57c-eca1-4101-93d6-13226d91b0da.notes: Altered wound modifiers: imp & pi++ are x1, pi+ is x1/2, pi is x1/3, pi- is x1/5

867d3715-3235-484f-82be-b68eec7502f6.name: @Rare: Acceleration, Altitude Sickness, Bends, Seasickness, Space Sickness, Nanomachines, etc.@

a571f4c7-af3c-47d1-b60e-ce1748597dba.name: +8 to all HT rolls to resist

9b8c4cfd-18cf-4052-b6b9-b101245de9c7.name: +3 to all HT rolls to resist
